person.persName: Leonidas S. Sullivan (Indiana resident and captain in 5th Kentucky Cavalry (U.S.A.))

body.p: Indiana resident and soldier. Indiana native. Son of John W. Sullivan and Mary Ann Sullivan. Student in Bartholomew County, Indiana, in 1850. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private and first sergeant from September 27, 1861, to May 18, 1863. Served in the 5th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first sergeant, second lieutenant, first lieutenant, and captain from May 18, 1863, to April 19, 1864. Served in the 9th U.S. Veteran Volunteer Infantry as private and company sergeant.
